title: Cranial window for longitudinal and multimodal imaging of the whole mouse cortex
excerpt: This paper described a multimodal mouse preparation suitable for Two-Photon Microscopy, functional US and BOLD fMRI with a ste-by-step protocol
citation: Tournissac M*, Boido D*, Omnes M, Goulam-Houssen Y, Ciobanu L and Charpak S (2022). "Cranial window for longitudinal and multimodal imaging of the whole mouse cortex" Neurophotonics. 9 (3).

title: Iliski, a software for robust calculation of transfer functions
excerpt: Introduction to a SW to compute Transfer Functions
citation: Aydin AK, Haselden WD, Dang J, Drew PJ, Charpak S*, Boido D*. (2021). "Iliski, a software for robust calculation of transfer functions" PLOS Comput. Biol.. 17(6).
